Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/inlinespiller-cpp/#l00137">137</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/inlinespiller-cpp">InlineSpiller.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### hoistAllSpills() {#a597bb5d7ef9a22f44dbe867d8eaa7fd6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void HoistSpillHelper::hoistAllSpills ()">
For spills with equal values, remove redundant spills and hoist those left to less hot spots.

Spills with equal values will be collected into the same set in MergeableSpills when spill is inserted. These equal spills are originated from the same defining instruction and are dominated by the instruction. Before hoisting all the equal spills, redundant spills inside in the same BB are first marked to be deleted. Then starting from the spills left, walk up on the dominator tree towards the Root node where the define instruction is located, mark the dominated spills to be deleted along the way and collect the BB nodes on the path from non-dominated spills to the define instruction into a WorkSet. The nodes in WorkSet are the candidate places where we are considering to hoist the spills. We iterate the WorkSet in bottom-up order, and for each node, we will decide whether to hoist spills inside its subtree to that node. In this way, we can get benefit locally even if hoisting all the equal spills to one cold place is impossible.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/inlinespiller-cpp/#l00140">140</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/inlinespiller-cpp">InlineSpiller.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### LRE&#95;DidCloneVirtReg() {#ad395a85b9e11855611ae547a3d332b8f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void HoistSpillHelper::LRE&#95;DidCloneVirtReg (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> New, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Old)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
For VirtReg clone, the <code>New</code> register should have the same physreg or stackslot as the <code>old</code> register.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/inlinespiller-cpp/#l00141">141</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/inlinespiller-cpp">InlineSpiller.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

## Private Member Functions

### getVisitOrders() {#a340502b165cdaf9a02be2dbb873f1d04}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void HoistSpillHelper::getVisitOrders (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; Root, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;, 16 &gt; &amp; Spills, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a94b65b831ad8756f7d3a029a1e599f75">MachineDomTreeNode</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; Orders, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; SpillsToRm, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a94b65b831ad8756f7d3a029a1e599f75">MachineDomTreeNode</a> &#42;, unsigned &gt; &amp; SpillsToKeep, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a94b65b831ad8756f7d3a029a1e599f75">MachineDomTreeNode</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; SpillBBToSpill)</>}>
Starting from <code>Root</code> find a top-down traversal order of the dominator tree to visit all basic blocks containing the elements of <code>Spills</code>.

Redundant spills will be found and put into <code>SpillsToRm</code> at the same time. <code>SpillBBToSpill</code> will be populated as part of the process and maps a basic block to the first store occurring in the basic block. 
<SectionUser title="Postcondition">
SpillsToRm.union(Spills@post) == Spills@pre
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/inlinespiller-cpp/#l00117">117</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/inlinespiller-cpp">InlineSpiller.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

  prototype={<>void HoistSpillHelper::rmRedundantSpills (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;, 16 &gt; &amp; Spills, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; SpillsToRm, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a94b65b831ad8756f7d3a029a1e599f75">MachineDomTreeNode</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; SpillBBToSpill)</>}>
Remove redundant spills in the same BB.

Save those redundant spills in SpillsToRm, and save the spill to keep and its BB in SpillBBToSpill map.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/inlinespiller-cpp/#l00112">112</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/inlinespiller-cpp">InlineSpiller.cpp</a>.

### runHoistSpills() {#ac5f7ed1a22c4d2a891cd66441f5ff73a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void HoistSpillHelper::runHoistSpills (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &amp; OrigLI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vninfo">VNInfo</a> &amp; OrigVNI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;, 16 &gt; &amp; Spills, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; SpillsToRm, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;, unsigned &gt; &amp; SpillsToIns)</>}>
Try to hoist spills according to BB hotness.

The spills to removed will be saved in <code>SpillsToRm</code>. The spills to be inserted will be saved in <code>SpillsToIns</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/inlinespiller-cpp/#l00124">124</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/inlinespiller-cpp">InlineSpiller.cpp</a>.

### Virt2SiblingsMap {#a52ba090f7be4ecd8bd113a72cd3ff675}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DenseMap&lt;Register, SmallSetVector&lt;Register, 16&gt; &gt; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;InlineSpiller.cpp&#125;::HoistSpillHelper::Virt2SiblingsMap</>}>
This is the map from original register to a set containing all its siblings.

To hoist a spill to another BB, we need to find out a live sibling there and use it as the source of the new spill.
